channel.title: TheCrafters001
channel.description: Making free software and games! All Open-Source!

item.title: Added Some Really Old Post from 2018!
Why is Pokémon Delta Green Taking So Long To Make?
Fixed a bug on the website!
item.description: <p>There was a bug that caused the twitter embed (on the right) to go <b><i>ALL</i></b> the way to the end of my feed, causing the website to look overly extended. Now it should no longer do that, and only extend down 2000px down. Oh, and now there are links on the home page for the software and games categories.</p>

item.title: Added new Game Updater Page
item.description: <p>So, I updated the website, and now there is a page for Game Updater. I am adding pages for software, and games that I make, but they are being added slowly, so yeah. Anyways, visit the home page to get to the page!</p>

item.title: Updated Blog Page
item.description: <p>Alright. I updated the blog page (the page you are on now) to now update how high the IFrame is when you look at the page. To be honest though, I have no idea if it works. This post was mainly created to test it out.</p>

item.title: GameJolt is Down till Noon EST 8/21/2020
Welcome to my new website
item.description: <p>Welcome to my new website! Heavily based on the code from <a href="http://frozentual.thecrafters001.ga/" target="_blank">Frozentual’s Website</a>. I think it is nice. It has a True Dark Mode. (The only mode you can use here.) What do you think? I think it is neat. Anyway. Bye. (PS: There is a twitter feed on the Home and Blog pages!)</p>

item.title: New comment System!
item.description: <p>So I have found a new comment system I can use! Hope you like it!</p>

item.title: Website Closed preview started!
item.description: <p>Website is now on a closed preview session for 24 hours.</p> <p>Timer Moved</p>

item.title: Website Migration
item.description: <p>Website migration started to the new w3.css system has started.</p>
